apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a loving couple consisting of two men, one with a neutral skin tone and the other with a dark skin tone, connected by a prominent, glossy red heart. The figures are designed with Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, evoking a sense of tenderness and unity.  This emoji is a powerful visual representation of male same-sex relationships, love, and companionship, adding heartfelt emotion to messages.
